column2: thumb]]The '''House of [[Finwë]]''' was a large [[Noldor]]in royal house that held the [[High_King_of_the_Noldor
column3: High Kingship of the Noldor]].  Its device was that of a great golden sun, even though Finwë was slain before the [[Sun]] was made.

column1: The House of Finwë had three main branches, one for each of the first Noldóran's sons; the [[House of Fëanor]], the [[House of Fingolfin]] and [[House of Finarfin]].

A star marks the High Kings of the Noldor.  Except in several cases, including that of Finwë, the first name listed is [[Sindarin]] and the second [[Quenya]].  Those with only one name given usually, but not neccessarily, have only a Quenya name, the one given.

column2: Míriel Serindë]] (first wife, gave birth to first son), = [[Indis]] (second wife, gave birth to other sons and daughters)

column1: Finwë's two daughters don't appear in the published ''[[Silmarillion]]''.

In earlier versions of the legendarium, Finwë and Indis had three daughters: '''Findis''', '''Faniel''' and '''Finvain'''. It remains unclear if the third daughter survived in the final conception of Finwë's family tree.<ref>{{PM
